csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

    <citation>
        <layout>
            <names variable="editor">
                <name/>
                <substitute>
                    <names variable="author"/>
                    <group>
                        <text variable="title"/>
                        <text value="... this should NOT appear" prefix=", "/>
                    </group>
                </substitute>
            </names>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
